songs.title: In My Head
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Say to me
It's more than a dream
It's more than it seems
Cause it means more to me
And from what I've seen
You're more than a melody

I don't need this
But I'm lost in the moment
You left with me
You were infinity
And I can't believe what I'm saying
But I need this to set me free
I'm thinking of you and me

[Chorus]
When I'm waking up, you're still in my head
I'm still thinking of all the things you said
On that summer night, under painted skies
In the strangest light I saw my whole life

[Verse 2]
Set me free
Cause all that you need
Is someone I'll never be
You were my ecstasy
But now it just aches to see
That you still have a piece of me

I don't need this
But I'm lost in the moment
You left with me
We were infinity
And I can't believe what I'm saying
But you had all my thoughts undone
I'm thinking that I could be the one

[Chorus]
When I'm waking up, you're still in my head
I'm still thinking of all the things you said
On that summer night under painted skies
In the strangest light I saw my whole life

When I'm waking up you're still in my head
I'm still thinking of all the things you said
Now I'm on my own trying to forget
Everything it cost
I'm lost in my head

[Chorus]
When I'm waking up, you're still in my head
I'm still thinking of all the things you said
On that summer night under painted skies
In the strangest light I saw my whole life

When I'm waking up you're still in my head
I'm still thinking of all the things you said
Now I'm on my own trying to forget
Everything it cost
I'm lost in my head
